name: CheckOnlineSources
0:
”Alexa, open check online sources”
”Alexa, start check online sources”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: check online sources
des:
We would like to provide an Alexa skill for finding credible online information, which we feel is very essential. This skill goes over the criteria of a reputable source, which will point users in the direction of factual information.

As a disclaimer: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
